claim.text: Alexander, writing in 1977, understood this. His pattern 87 — Individually Owned Shops
claim.claim: Christopher Alexander's pattern 87 is titled 'Individually Owned Shops' and was published in 1977

results.summary: Christopher Alexander's 'A Pattern Language' was published in 1977 and pattern 87 is titled 'Individually Owned Shops'.
results.detail: A Pattern Language: Towns, Buildings, Construction by Christopher Alexander et al. was published by Oxford University Press in 1977. The book contains 253 patterns numbered sequentially, and pattern 87 is indeed 'Individually Owned Shops'. This is standard bibliographic information about a seminal work in architecture and design theory. High confidence based on well-established publication history, though web verification was not available.
sources: Christopher Alexander et al., A Pattern Language: Towns, Buildings, Construction, Oxford University Press, 1977
